about_the_game:
Fuse offers an unprecedented approach to high quality 3D character creation. Users can browse through a vast number of mesh and texture choices to get customized, rigged, high quality characters in a matter of minutes.

Fuse is a data-driven 3D character creator. It was developed in collaboration between Mixamo and Vladlen Koltun’s research group at Stanford University, with Siddhartha Chaudhuri as chief architect and programmer. With the latest release, Fuse integrates Allegorithmic’s Substance technology for a complete character modeling solution.
detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Create custom 3D characters by fusing body parts together
  • Excellent topology for project-ready characters, previs, or to use as your base models
  • Free Fusible characters on release include The Scout, The Sniper, and The Spy from TF2, with additional characters available in the near future!
  • Dynamic character texturing using Allegorithmic’s Substance technology
  • Select and scale limbs to custom proportions
  • Upload characters directly from Fuse to Mixamo. Rig and animate a character in minutes
  • Export characters as .obj files with diffuse, normal and specular maps
